name: Voipas
description:
Voipas is a virtual assistant for PC. In case you need a companion while browsing your PC, someone to give you an advice when you feel down or remind you to study for exams. It's still in early stage but with your opinions and sugestions we can make a great virtual assistant.
For now, the overlap effect on the screen works only if there are no windows on desktop. For example, if you open a fullscreen window and then open Voipas there will not be the overlap effect.
Over 50 phrases including:
-How was your day at work?
-How was your day at school?
-Did you study for your exam? It's better to begin studying earlier.
-Don't forget to study for your exam.
-Good luck with the exam.
-It's late, I think you should go to sleep.
-It's so late, you better go to sleep.
